oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organization and minutes book for the Lewis Collins Post No. 98, G.A.R., Department of Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organization and minutes book for the Lewis Collins Post No. 98, Grand Army of the Republic, Department of Tennessee. The tome gives a listing of members and contains the by-laws for the chapter as well as minutes for the; meetings. Items related to the deaths of Lieutenant Sam Swafford (January 28, 1843-November 27, 1936) and his wife, Carrie Emmiline Parham Swafford (March 6, 1849-December 17, 1934), are also included.
